articles.title: Queens County Transit adds to its fleet
articles.description: Queens Community Transit (QCT) has added another vehicle to its fleet.
articles.content:
Queens Community Transit (QCT) has added another vehicle to its fleet.

articles.author: Jennifer Pagliaro - City Hall Bureau
articles.title: ‘I’m surprised no one’s done anything about that’: Residents push to change ‘Indian’ street names as debate over Dundas heads to council
articles.description: Move to rename Dundas Street could open the floodgates for changing more questionable place names and street names in Toronto.
articles.content:
Residents in the city’s west end say changing the street names in their area is long overdue, with the outdated and offensive “Indian” printed on signs all over.
Home to Indian Road, Indian Road Cre… [+12558 chars]

articles.author: Nicholas Keung - Immigration Reporter
articles.title: They left the Philippines for temporary work. How this small Manitoba town became home
articles.description: In the rural town of Russell, one hotel has helped attract more than 200 newcomers who embrace, and are embraced by, the local community. ‘We are all one community,’ says the mayor.
articles.content:
Chrisie Servanez had been told what to expect of her new home in Canada.
It was remote. There would be no public transit. Stores close by 7 p.m.
Still, it couldn’t be that bad, thought the migrant … [+23144 chars]

articles.title: Backpacker hostel brand GoStops raises $1 million in pre-series A round
